summary: Simple mod that changes Raise Zombie spell of Serana, so she won't leave such a ... really big amount of ashpiles anymore. Fully compatible with mods that change her appearance.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod that changes Raise Zombie spell of Serana. She uses it very often and leaves a mess because of those ashpiles. I HATE ASHPILES.

Big thanks to LazyAltmer for a better idea - at first this mod deleted the spell from Serana, now it changes it to not leave ashpiles.

HOW TO INSTALL:
Place "BetterSeranaRaiseZombie.esp" in your Skyrim Data folder, for example D:SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData, and enable it in Data files in your Launcher.
Or just use NMM. NMM is better.


Where to place it in your load order - ABOVE any mods that change her looks or anything about her, because if my mod is below, it makes her look like in vanilla game. Remember, the one below always wins.

MY EXAMPLE:
UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul.esp
UFO-DawnguardAddOn.esp
BetterSeranaRaiseZombie.esp
SBF All in one + DLC.esp (this is the one that changes her looks)


Please leave a comment if you have any suggestions, or if you find out that my mod is not compatible with some other mods, so I can warn other people which one does not work.
author: WikGru
